title: What the fuck riot
body:
Placed in bronze 5 after 7/10 wins. WTF are you on riot? 4 years I spent on this game playing with my higher ranked friends eg diamond 1~2. And you go place me and 1000s of others who don't deserve it ? Maybe if you stopped making so many shittyy LCS comps, and pointless skins. You'd be able to pull your heads from out your asses and see the problems,  the people, the ranking, the depression that is caused by your fuckiing retarded elo system. The one where you can get caught between leagues eg s5 and b1, you can get caught in a loop that screws up your mmr by losing 5-10 games  and then winning 1 and staying in s5 and restarting the loop, making you get placed with worse people who ultimately ruin the game for you and making nearly impossible to climb. Bring back the elo ladder FFS. Reset everyone's mmr and let them go. Because atm the way things are Dyrus can play 1 game and already be diamond. Like if they're in diamond theyll be able to get back there??? Reset this mmr it's stupid the way you've set this game up. 4 years I lost to this game and all I can show for it is bronze because you set the ranking wrong. And ive made a alt account to reset mmr. I got to s2 and I was vsing plats. Reset everyone's mmr and let them actually have a fresh start. The pros will get back to where they are, and if they don't you have new pros from the reset anyway.  
PS fix your bruisers, they're making the need for tanks pointless.

I know it's the mmr, I gave up in season 4 and sunk my account after the loop. The point is that rank isn't being ranked on my actual skill which is stupid, where's the point in ranked if you're not ranked on your skill. And every year they "reset" it's bull%%%% it doesn't do anything but put you lower...

So you claim to have purposely let your MMR drop then complain about not being ranked by your skill? Of course you're not going to be ranked on your skill if you're not trying. Not to mention people generally think they're better than they actually are, maybe check that you're not overestimating your ability to perform before blaming Riots system.
